text: Alexandre di Gregorio (born 12 February 1980) is a Belgian football striker who currently plays for RFC Tilleur SG, for the 2015–2016 season.Profile at Footballdatabase He also played for RKC Waalwijk. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:K.R.C. title: Alexandre Di Gregorio
